name: Less distraction, more focus!
description:
Less distractions, more focus!

A game about trying to meditate, noting your thoughts and “gently” pushing them away 

Be the brain of a person and, under 1 minute, try not to let 3 thoughts blow themselves up – punch them before this happens!

Walk with “a” & “d” keys, jump with “w” and punch with “space”.

A Game by Pietro Ferrari & Yoshio Ichikawa( for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3 (and our very first game \o/).

Theme: Less is More!

Font “The Bambank Script” made by DumadiStyle, available at: https://www.dafont.com/pt/the-bambank-script.font?text=You+Win%21&back=theme
